prompts: Create a legendary water-type Pokemon with sleek, dragon-like features and vibrant hues.
I want a majestic Pokemon that embodies the essence of space and time, with shimmering colors.
Generate a creature that resembles a mythical guardian of oceans, showcasing blue and pink shades.
Make a towering, bipedal Pokemon with a regal stance and intricate patterns on its body.
Imagine a celestial Pokemon with sharp claws and a flowing design, fitting for a powerful deity.
Design a cosmic water dragon Pokemon that stands out with unique color gradients and features.
Show me a robust Pokemon that exudes both strength and elegance, with a blend of blue and purple.

distinctive_features: Dragon-like head with a prominent crest
